resources.string: Madhushravani
Collecting Pooja Samagri
History of Madhushravani\nKnow More

This is a festival of serpent worship performed by newly married couples. The 13-day ritual commences on the fifth lunar day of the first fortnight of Shravan and completes on the third lunar day of the second fortnight of the month. For 12 days, the ritual is performed by the newly married girls only. On the 13th and last day (Madhushravani), the couple performs the rituals. Madhushravani initiates the newly married girls into the worldly life. Girls on each of the 12 days move in the gardens in bridal clothes and collect seasonal flowers, leaves of trees and put them in baskets made of bamboos. They worship the serpent god, Lord Shiva with his consort Gauri daily and a senior family woman narrates stories on every day during the 12-day period. These stories are full of religious anecdotes aimed at making the girls aware of their duties.
Hello blank fragment
Get Started with Prepration
Making ofGauri Ji

This step is done a day before festival starts,So in evening various Geet of "Bhagwati" , "Mahadev" , "Bhramin", "Hanuman" ,"Gauri" are sung. Meanwhile the Gauri ji idol is prepared by mixing and grinding "Dhoobh" ,raw turmeric(kachcha haldi) and coriender seeds(dhaniya).After that take a mud plate or cap of earthern pot and place red cloth and put gauri ji over a coin and cover her with Paan leaf,put sindur over that leaf and cover whole it with red cloth. Keep this into your mandir(near "Bhagwati")\n See Image
Making of Visahara
For this step ,we will create all the devtas that we will be worshiping in these thirteen days in natural form
Take five leaves of Maina and banana each two set assuming each set from Parents and from In-Laws.Now draw 5-5 times visahar from sinduur, kajal, Pithar and shree khand chandan \nSee Image
Create ten Visahara five each from Parents and In-Laws respectively by using clay and add grass(doobh) in their mouth\nSee Image
Preparing other items
This is for the worship of Kusumwati,Pingala,Chenaai and Lilicreate four pooda of banana leaf\nDhaan will be kept below Purhar,Patil
Chenaai - Take some Rice(arwa) in daali with money and curd
Binni Motri - Take long square red Piece of cloth and put धनी,धान,दुब ,हरिद ,सुपारी ,बड़ी इलाइची,लौंग ,छोटकी इलाइची with eleven rupees and make a knot
Colleting Naivedh Rice(arwa),beaten rice(चूड़ा),sugar,mango,banana,sprouts,Jackfruit\n\n See Image
Drawing Aripan
Now Listen to these five BINI three times
Start Todays Pooja by clicking on these devtas

एक दिन एकटा बूढी स्नानक हेतु पोखैर गेलि त देखलखिन जे धार में एकटा चिकनी पात पर पाँच टा किछु लहलाहैत अछि I ओ जीव सब बूढी के कहलखिन जे –हे बूढी ! गाम जा क लोक सब के सूचित क दिअऊ जे आई मौनी पंचमी थिकैक से लोक सब अपना घर आँगन के निक जेकाँ पवित्र कय,स्नान कय पाँच टा मईटक आकृति बना ओहि में सिंदूर-पिठार लगा दूभि साईट देथिन आ हुनका पर नेबो, नीमक पात ,कुश चढेथिन I नव बर्तन में खीर आ घुरजौर बनेती .ओकर बाद बिसहारा क पूजा कय हुनका दूध,लावा ,खीर आ घुरजौर चढ़ा अपनों सब नेबो नीम खीर-घुरजौर के सेवन करैथ I जे कियो एही प्रकारे पूजा करता तिनका कल्याण हेतनि I
बूढी गाम आबि सबके कहलखिन I सब गोटा बूढी के कहलानुसारे पूजा केलनि,मुदा किछु लोग एकरा मात्र खिस्सा बुझि अनठा देलैथ I जे सब पूजा केलैथ से सब त ठीक रहला मुदा जे नय केलैथ से सब राति में मरि गेल I गावँ में हाहाकार मचि गेल I सब लोग धार लग ओहि बूढी संगे फेर गेलैथ त देखलखिन जे पाँचो बिसहारा साँप ओहिना लहलहैत छेलेथ I सब हुनका आगु कल जोरि मुइला क जियेवाक उपाय पुछलखिन I तखन बिसहारा कहलखिन जे – पहिने त ओ सब हमरा अनुसारे पावनि नहीं केलैथ ते सब मरि गेला ,आब एके उपाय जँ गाम में ककरो कराही में खीर-धोरजौर लागल हैत तँ ओकरा मूईल सब के मुँह में चटा देवैक त ओ सब पुनः जीवित भय जेता मुदा आगु सं नियमित मौनी पंचमी के पूजा करता I
गाम क लोक बिसहारा क कहलानुसार केलेथ आ सब मुइल लोक सब पुनः जीवित भय गेला ,और सब गोटा बिसहरी माता क प्रणाम कई हुनका स क्षमा मंगलैथ I

एक दिन गौरी महादेव सरोवर में जल क्रीङा करैत छलाह I संयोगवश शिव के वीर्य स्खलन भय गेल I महादेव ओकरा पुरैनिक पात पर राखि देलखिन I ओहि सं बिसहारा पाँचो बहिन क जन्म भेल I महादेव के अपना संतान पाँचो बिसहारा सं मोह भय गेल ,ओ प्रतिदिन सरोवर में स्नान लेल जाथिन आ बङी -बङी काल धरि ओकरा सब संगे खेलैथ I गौरी क संदेह होमए लगलैन I ओ एक दिन महादेव के पाछु पाछु सरोवर तक गेलथ आ ओतय शिव के अनका संगे खेलाइत देख क्रोधित भय गेलैथ आ सब बिसहरी के फेकए लागलि I तखन महादेव हुनका बुझेलखिन जे ई सब हुनकर बेटी छिएनि आ कल्याणकारी छैथ I मृत्युभुवन में सावन मास जे एय पाँचो बहिन छी-जाया ,बिसहरी ,शामिलबारी आ दोतलि के पूजा करतैथ ओ धन-ध्यान सं पूर्ण होयतथि आ ओकरा सब तरहे कल्याण होयत I
देवता सब के प्रणाम करि बिनी क पोटरी कलश पर राखि सब जेष्ठ सब के प्रणाम करि ,पूजा बला साडी खोलि राईख देथिन,जकरा फेर सब दिन पूजा काल पहिरल जायत I
Now Listen to these three BINI five times

Important Note
Now perform following steps for Temi
Write your Vrat Experience or Views with our Maithil Community 😊

Preapre Three new saree for:
► One will be used for making Gauri ji and collect flowers and fresh leaves
► Second will be used during the Thirteen Days of Pooja and Katha 
► Third one will be used at last day
► And New bangels of Laah as well and Sindur
The following step is performed a day before Madhushrawani Fast starts
Start Pooja by selecting the respective Day
Getting ready for Pooja
► Girl needs to wash her hair,cut her nails\n► Get the Mehendi and Mahavar done

► Girl will wear new saree and take khoichcha along with her 
► Then she will go to pluck flowers and fresh leaves like "Lemon","Bamboo" in a daala
► Then decorate daala with those leaves and flowers beauitfully 
► FulLodhi Geet will be sung during this time 
 See Image
Listen To Bini
Read from Book

Now spread all the flowers and leaves on the 
serpents and all over the Aripan covering all the devtas 
Put the Bini Motri over the Kalash 
Take Blessings of elders \Change the saree to wear it next day
Know the History of this Pooja
Pooja Samagri

See Aripan Image
Draw a square Aripan and place all the devtas in between on their respective Aripans according to direction which is described as follow
Purhara Patil
►Two circle like Aripan will be drawn on north and south corner of square
► Place the purhar on above baalu on the northern circle aripan
► Place Patil on above baalu on the southern circle of aripan 
►Patil will have Diya of Tel and Baati
 Kalash
This is placed on west side of Purhar Patil
 Soorya and Chandrama
Drawn on the south of Kalash Aripan
 Naag-Bhaag
Drawn in form of pair on north of Soorya and Chandrama Aripan
 NavGrah
Drawn like nine flower on west of Naag-Bhaag Aripan 
 Kusumawati and Pinglaak
Drawn two Aripan like three flower 
►norhtern one is for Kusmawati
►southern one is for Pinglaak
 Lili and Chenaai
This is drawn below Kusumawati and Pinglaak Aripan 
► Two Aripan of three flower design will be drawn
►northern one is for Chenaai 
► southern one is for Lili
 Gauri
Drawn five flower like Aripan on west and in front of Kalash
► Gauri is placed in between three flower of Aripan
 Saathik
Drawn on south of Gauri Aripan in from of three Aripan
